alert.note: Alert for Buttonwillow - Lost Hills - I5; Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Delano-Wasco-Shafter; Hanford - Corcoran - Lemoore; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued December 19 at 12:54AM PST until December 19 at 11:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 31. For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Los Banos -Dos Palos, Merced -Madera -Mendota, West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties, Caruthers -San Joaquin - Selma, Buttonwillow -Lost Hills -I5, Delano-Wasco-Shafter and Hanford -Corcoran -Lemoore. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, until 7 AM PST this morning. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 11 AM PST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions can damage or kill crops, or other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.
